long_description: A great value! REI W6 compact binoculars are ideal for hiking and general outdoor use, featuring precision optics for excellent color and clarity. Fully coated optics use high-transmission antireflective lens coatings for bright and color-true imaging. Roof prism design offers a slim and compact profile that can be easily folded and carried in a pocket via the double-hinged body. Long eye relief and fold-down eyecups allow users with eyeglasses to more easily view a stable, bright image. O-ring-sealed, nitrogen-filled housing keeps binoculars fully weather- and fog-proof for use in adverse conditions. Rubber-armored housing ensures a firm grip in the field and enhanced protection against shock. Includes a nylon carry case, neck strap, lens tissue and instructions for use.
short_description: A great value! REI W6 compact binoculars are ideal for hiking and general outdoor use, featuring precision optics for excellent color and clarity.
